original_text: Then some teachers of God's Law said to themselves: ‘This man is speaking as if he is God. That is not right.’
korean_text: 어떤 서기관들이 속으로 이르되 이 사람이 신성을 모독하도다

sentences.original_text: Then some teachers of God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하나님의 율법 교사 몇 사람이

sentences.original_text: 'This man is speaking as if he is God.'
